item.title: Marry Me Chicken & White Beans
item.dc:creator: Katie Austin
item.description:
Welcome to a twist on everyone’s favorite Marry Me Chicken that’s creamy and loaded with protein + fiber. This version swaps heavy cream for blended cottage cheese and adds hearty white beans for added nutrition. More importantly, it’s SO GOOD!

The post Marry Me Chicken & White Beans appeared first on KA Daily.
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to a twist on everyone’s favorite Marry Me Chicken that’s creamy and loaded with protein + fiber. This version swaps heavy cream for blended cottage cheese and adds hearty white beans for added nutrition. More importantly, it’s SO GOOD!

The post Marry Me Chicken & White Beans appeared first on KA Daily.
